fields.Description/Abstract:
SOMETIMES THIEVES is a feature-length screenplay written by Ryan Cannon, and optioned by YouGoFar Production in December of 2013.

The screenplay is currently in development with Wild Invention Pictures, and Ramaa Mosley is attached to direct the film. The producing and directing team are top-tier, with several independent internationally distributed films in their track record, including THE LIFEGUARD (2013) and THE BRASS TEAPOT (2012). 

In 2015, the film has been cast with top-tier talent Josh Hartnett and Julia Garner, and is now in a financing phase,  with production tentatively slated for spring, 2016.

As of fall 2016, the production company has been unable to secure funding for production, and the option has expired. 
Role:  Principal
